WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing this issue since need was met.
WorkItem.Description:
Would it be possible to get a transaction set to support x12.852 "Product Activity Data"? I hope I am asking for the right thing as I am very new to EDI and trying to pick this up and integrate it. I'm having a very hard time trying to actually find the 852 specifications without signing up for $500+ memberships, so if anybody can tell me where that type of information is found as well, that would also be greatly appreciated, but I digress. Please let me know if an 852 set is possible or if there is anything I can do to help aid in this request.
Â 
Thank you!

Comments.Message: This can be done by either supplying me with a url to a specification such as http://shophqf.com/vendorportal/EDE/Documents/NSG_UCS_852.pdf and.or giving me a sample message that I can test against.  The work this specification will probably take about an hour, which I can probably get to in the next weekish.  I can add it to the current source code, though I don't expect to do another release for a 3-4 more weeks.  I can also show you how to inject the specification into the current release.

I'm sorry. I'm very new to EDI and I wasn't sure what I was looking at or for, but I now realize that I am needing X12.846 which I see this library handles so I will try that. Thank you for your response though.
